column1: This whole coronavirus thing is really surreal. Don’t get me wrong, it’s something we should be taking seriously, but watching the news right now, seeing all of these places go under lockdown and people dying, all while my life hasn’t really been impacted much, it feels off.

This whole coronavirus thing is really surreal. Don’t get me wrong, it’s something we should be taking seriously, but watching the news right now, seeing all of these places go under lockdown and people dying, all while my life hasn’t really been impacted much, it feels off.
